entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:11 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
